db:info.db:title: UI Components
db:info.db:titleabbrev: A test project for QDoc build artifacts

db:article.db:para: This is a listing of a list of UI components implemented by QML types. These files are available for general import and they are based on the Qt Quick Code Samples.
This module is part of the UIComponents example.

db:listitem.db:para: A component that shows the progress of an event.
A component that can be turned on or off.
A widget that places its children as tabs.
